title: NNN: Dumpling Night
description: A 5-hour celebration of lunar new year with dinner, performance, and a discussion

items.title: Organic California Mandarins & Lots of New Year Candy
Wudang West Longevity Tea Blend (Ripe Puerh)
items.description: A high grade, old tree, artisanal blend of Xiang Tu ripe puerh (2016) and 7572 ginseng aroma (2000) from Kunming, Yunnan;  Custom pressed for Wudang West

items.title: Mung Bean Smoothie
items.description: Jerone’s mom says this is very popular in Taiwan right now.  We think it’s delicious and that is will make for an excellent  cocktail mixer.

items.title: Spiked Mung Bean Smoothie
items.description: Same as above, but with your preferred amount of sake? Or baijiu?

items.title: Pear Ginger Soju Spritzer
items.description: Asian honey gold pears pureed with ginger, seltzer, and soju

items.title: Madame President’s Herbal Tea Blends (Skylight Farm Lab)
items.description: (Post dinner only) 2 herbal teas grown by Renee in our rooftop garden: Tulsi & Lavender or Apple mint & Catmint.

items.title: Spicy Cumin “Beef”
items.description: Our plant-based take on a classic western Chinese flavor profile: spicy and savory with loads of garlic. Beyond Beef, Garlic, Cumin, Dried chilis from our rooftop garden, GF “No Soy” Soy Sauce, Shaoxing wine, Salt, Carrots, Lentils (V, SF, GF)

items.title: Classic Chive
items.description: Don’t fix what ain’t broken. We like ours extra heavy on the chives. Impossible Beef, Chives,Gginger, Garlic Soy sauce, Silken tofu, White pepper (V, GF)

items.title: Chrysanthemum Delight
items.description: Sumptuous, delicate, and floral flavors to bring in the new year. Don’t miss it! Chrysanthemum greens, Napa Cabbage, Pumpkin Seeds, Sprouted Sunflower Seeds, Shiitake Mushroom, Glass Noodles, Chinese Mushroom Bouillon (V, SF, GF)
